Package database

Class DBappointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DBappointment
  • public class DBappointment
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all database calls that access the appointments table.

      • conflictExists

        public static boolean conflictExists​(int cus_Id,
                                     int app_Id,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime endTime)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Scans database for given customer's time conflicting appointments
        Parameters:
        cus_Id - the customer id of appointment
        app_Id - the appointment id of appointment
        startTime - the start time of appointment
        endTime - the end time of appointment
        Returns:
        true if suggested appointment overlaps with existing ones
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Calls SQL Database Statements.
